description: Fusing concurrently collected MEG and EEG data into a unified representation using a multi-modal neural network architecture. Attempted to use a recurrent convolutional neural network to classify each modality. Stopped after this paper did it better than I ever could: http://arxiv.org/pdf/1511.06448v3.pdf
README.md:
# neurofusion
Fusing concurrently collected MEG and EEG data into a unified representation using a DBM-LSTM architecture
